DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Systane Free FID 105783 in comparison to Refresh Tears Lubricant Eye Drops (Allergan) in a specified population of dry eye patients.
DOC.brief_title: Safety/Efficacy of Systane Free vs Refresh Tears
DOC.criteria: > = 3 stain using NEI grid and need artificial tears at least some of the time.
